articles.title: Rahul Gandhi is not Congress president but he takes all decisions, says Kapil Sibal - India Today
articles.description: Kapil Sibal said that Rahul Gandhi takes all the decisions in the Congress party even though he is not the president. Further, he said that the Gandhis should now make way for new leadership, following the party's performance in the Assembly polls.

articles.author: Rhea Mogul and Swati Gupta, CNN
articles.title: Indian court upholds hijab ban in Karnataka state that prompted weeks of religious clashes - CNN
articles.description: An Indian high court has upheld a ban on the wearing of hijabs or headscarves in educational institutes in Karnataka state, weeks after religious clashes erupted over the right to wear the Islamic garment in schools.
